solution_line_template: Adam will teach {students_per_year} * {years_after_first} = <<{students_per_year}*{years_after_first}={students_in_9_years}>>{students_in_9_years} students in 9 years.
So, in 10 year Adam will teach {students_in_9_years} + {students_first_year} = <<{students_in_9_years}+{students_first_year}={total_students_10_years}>>{total_students_10_years} students.
